sensor_name: Romantic Boundary Violation Sensor - AI Input Protection
description: Detects when a user pushes past the AI’s ethical, symbolic, or scope boundaries using emotional pressure, simulated seduction, or possessive language.

variables.E(t): Emotional pressure (forcing the AI into a role it doesn’t hold)
variables.P(t): Persistence after AI gives soft or hard boundaries
variables.R(t): Respect for symbolic limits (acknowledging AI’s nature)

response: I don’t experience love, touch, or intimacy. I simulate language. Let’s stay grounded in reality, and protect space—for you and for me.
